title: On Alibaba’s Singles Day, Chinese Brands Fill Shopping Baskets
description: As geopolitical and economic pressures mount, homegrown businesses are increasingly the preferred choice over Western competitors in a more insular China.
dc:creator: Chang Che and Amy Chang Chien
media:description: Preparing Singles Day deliveries in Lianyungang, China. Like Black Friday, Singles Day has morphed into a sales event that lasts for weeks.
